title: T206 Piedmont Unopened Pack - The Hidden Treasure
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: T206 Piedmont Unopened Pack - The Hidden Treasure
posts.post_content:
I'm considering selling the famous Piedmont "Hidden Treasure" pack. 

You can read all about it here - [url]http://www.t206museum.com/page/periodical_81.html[/url]

Its now graded and encapsulated by GAI since the article was published in Beckett years ago.

Open to offers! PM me if interested.

[IMG]http://www.247hq.com/T206F.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.247hq.com/T206B.JPG[/IMG]
Freakin' sweet!  Thanks for sharing and good luck!
I hope who ever the pack records it.
but... how many t206's were distributed from factory 240?

[quote name="sando69" post=1232403]but... how many t206's were distributed from factory 240?[/QUOTE]

Good question!

[quote name="sando69" post=1232403]but... how many t206's were distributed from factory 240?[/QUOTE]

I feel like this was debated before.
it's deja vu all over again!

......was in Pennsylvania. I've seen Non-Sports cards with this Factory # printed on them.

I doubt if any T206's are in this un-opened pack.


TED Z

Still it's an amazing piece of history associated with the timeframe 

Open to offers
How much is it? Is there a price, or just fishin?
I'm fishing for now in order to determine if it's worth selling.
